nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Ice - Solid with Melting - Liquid Water and Freezing - Solid Ice
Raw Egg to Cooked Egg with crossed arrow
Understands reversible change: Ice melts and refreezes
Misunderstands irreversible change: Cooked egg cannot become raw again
Clarify irreversibility: Emphasize cooked egg change
